query.description: What fields (static, non-final) are shared?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No static, non-final fields are shared between two or more threads. select O.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", O.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", F.FieldName "Field__]", THO.ThreadName "Thread__|", FS.ReadCount "Read Count__(sum on 2,3)(r)", FS.WriteCount "Write Count__(sum on 2,3)(r)", THO.ThreadName "Threads Involved__(count distinct)(r)", F.ID "FieldId__(hide)" from OBJECT O, FIELD F, FIELDSTATICTHREAD FS, OBJECT THO where F.DeclaringType = O.Id and F.Final = 'N' and FS.FIELD = F.ID and THO.ID = FS.Thread order by O.PackageName,O.ClassName,F.FieldName,THO.ThreadName

query.description: What is the stack trace for this lock acquisition?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT s.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", s.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", s.INFILE "File", s.LOCATION "Location", s.ATLINE "Line__(r)" FROM TABLE (STACKTRACE(?LATRACE?)) s

query.description: Where is this field accessed by the program?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT DISTINCT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__(r)|" FROM ACCESS A, TRACE TR, SITE S, OBJECT CO WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND TR.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = TR.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS ORDER BY 1,2,3

query.description: Where is this lock acquired by the program?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT DISTINCT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__(r)|", CASE WHEN L.TYPE = 'U' AND L.LOCK != L.OBJECT AND L.OBJECT = RW.READLOCK THEN 'java.util.concurrent ReadWriteLock.readLock()' WHEN L.TYPE = 'U' AND L.LOCK != L.OBJECT AND L.OBJECT = RW.WRITELOCK THEN 'java.util.concurrent ReadWriteLock.writeLock()' WHEN L.TYPE = 'I' THEN 'Intrinsic' ELSE 'java.util.concurrent Lock' END "Type" FROM LOCK L INNER JOIN TRACE TR ON TR.ID = L.TRACE INNER JOIN SITE S ON S.ID = TR.SITE INNER JOIN OBJECT CO ON CO.ID = S.INCLASS LEFT OUTER JOIN RWLOCK RW ON RW.ID = L.LOCK WHERE L.LOCK = ?Lock? AND L.STATE = 'AFTER ACQUISITION' ORDER BY 1,2,3

query.description: When and by what threads was this object indirectly accessed?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT THO.THREADNAME "Thread__|", IA.TS "Time", CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__(hide)", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__(hide)", S.ATLINE "Line__(hide)", IA.TRACE "ATRACE__(hide)" FROM INDIRECTACCESS IA, TRACE T, SITE S, OBJECT CO, OBJECT THO WHERE IA.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND T.ID = IA.TRACE AND S.ID = T.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS AND THO.ID = IA.INTHREAD

query.description: How often is a lock held when this field is accessed after object construction?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No locks are ever held when this field is accessed. SELECT LOCKS.*, ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT "?Field? Access Count__(r)", CAST (((CAST (LOCKS."Times Acquired__(r)" AS FLOAT)) / (CAST (ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT AS FLOAT))) * 100 AS DECIMAL) "Percentage Held__(r)" FROM (SELECT OBJID(LOCK) "Lock__(r)", LOCK "Lock__(hide)", COUNT(LOCK) "Times Acquired__(r)" FROM (SELECT L.LOCK FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT LH.LOCKHELD "LOCK" FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD LH WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND LH.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N') AS FOO GROUP BY LOCK) AS LOCKS, (SELECT COUNT(*) "ACCESSCOUNT" FROM ACCESS A WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N') AS ACCESSES

query.description: When and by what threads was this field accessed?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT '?Package?' "Package__('package.gif')", '?Class?' "Class__('class.gif')", '?Field?' "Field", THO.THREADNAME "Thread__|", A.TS "Time", CASE WHEN A.RW = 'R' THEN 'Read' ELSE 'Write' END "Access", CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__(hide)", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__(hide)", S.ATLINE "Line__(hide)", A.ID "AID__(hide)", A.TRACE "ATRACE__(hide)" FROM ACCESS A, OBJECT THO, TRACE T, SITE S, OBJECT CO WHERE T.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = T.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS AND THO.Id = A.InThread AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER IS NULL ORDER BY A.TS ASC

query.description: What fields (non-static) have a lock set?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No non-final non-volatile non-static fields that are shared after object construction have a common lock held for each access. SELECT O.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", O.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", FI.FieldName "Field__|", COUNT(DISTINCT I.Receiver) "Instances", I.Field "FieldId__(hide)" FROM OBJECT O INNER JOIN FIELD FI ON FI.DeclaringType = O.Id INNER JOIN INTERESTINGFIELD I ON FI.STATIC = 'N' AND I.FIELD=FI.ID INNER JOIN FIELDINSTANCELOCKSET F ON F.FIELD = I.FIELD AND F.RECEIVER = I.RECEIVER GROUP BY O.PackageName,O.ClassName,FI.FieldName,I.Field ORDER BY O.PackageName,O.ClassName,FI.FieldName

query.description: What fields (static) have a lock set?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No non-final non-volatile static fields that are shared have a common lock held for each access. SELECT O.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", O.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", FI.FieldName "Field", OBJID(F.LOCK) "Lock__|", F.LOCK "Lock__(hide)", I.FIELD "FieldId__(hide)" FROM OBJECT O INNER JOIN FIELD FI ON FI.DeclaringType = O.Id INNER JOIN INTERESTINGFIELD I ON I.RECEIVER IS NULL AND I.FIELD=FI.ID INNER JOIN FIELDLOCKSET F ON F.FIELD = I.FIELD ORDER BY O.PackageName,O.ClassName,FI.FieldName

query.description: What fields are accessed by multiple threads during object construction?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No fields are accessed by multiple threads during object construction. select O.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", O.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", F.FieldName "Field__|", SUM(FI.ReadUCCount) + SUM(FI.ReadCount) "Reads__(sum on 2,3)(r)", SUM(FI.WriteUCCount) + SUM(FI.WriteCount) "Writes__(sum on 2,3)(r)", SUM(FI.ReadUCCount) "Reads During Construction__(sum on 2,3)(r)", SUM(FI.WriteUCCount) "Writes During Construction__(sum on 2,3)(r)", COUNT(FI.Receiver) "Instances__(r)", COUNT(DISTINCT THO.ThreadName) "Threads Involved__(r)", F.Id "FieldId__(hide)" from BADPUBLISH B, OBJECT O, FIELD F, FIELDINSTANCETHREAD FI, OBJECT THO where F.ID = B.FIELD and F.DeclaringType = O.Id and FI.FIELD = F.ID and THO.ID = FI.Thread group by O.PackageName,O.ClassName,F.FieldName,F.Id order by O.PackageName,O.ClassName,F.FieldName

query.description: Where is this field accessed while this lock is held?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__(r)|" FROM ACCESS A, TRACE TR, SITE S, OBJECT CO, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND TR.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = TR.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS AND ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND L.LOCK = ?Lock? UNION DISTINCT SELECT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__(r)|" FROM ACCESS A, TRACE TR, SITE S, OBJECT CO, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD L WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND TR.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = TR.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS AND ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND L.LOCKHELD = ?Lock? ORDER BY 1,2,3

query.description: What fields (static) are shared?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No static fields are shared between two or more threads. select O.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", O.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", F.FieldName "Field__]", THO.ThreadName "Thread__|", FS.ReadCount "Read Count__(sum on 2,3)(r)", FS.WriteCount "Write Count__(sum on 2,3)(r)", THO.ThreadName "Threads Involved__(count distinct)(r)", F.ID "FieldId__(hide)" from OBJECT O, FIELD F, FIELDSTATICTHREAD FS, OBJECT THO where F.DeclaringType = O.Id and FS.FIELD = F.ID and THO.ID = FS.Thread order by O.PackageName,O.ClassName,F.FieldName,THO.ThreadName

query.description: How often is a lock held when this object is indirectly accessed?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No locks are ever held when this field is indirectly accessed. SELECT LOCKS.*, ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT "Access Count__(r)", CAST (((CAST (LOCKS."Times Acquired__(r)" AS FLOAT)) / (CAST (ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT AS FLOAT))) * 100 AS DECIMAL) "Percentage Held__(r)" FROM (SELECT OBJID(LOCK) "Lock__(r)", LOCK "Lock__(hide)", COUNT(LOCK) "Times Acquired__(r)" FROM (SELECT L.LOCK FROM INDIRECTACCESS A, INDIRECTACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? UNION ALL SELECT LH.LOCKHELD "LOCK" FROM INDIRECTACCESS A, INDIRECTACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD LH WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND LH.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver?) AS FOO GROUP BY LOCK) AS LOCKS, (SELECT COUNT(*) "ACCESSCOUNT" FROM INDIRECTACCESS A WHERE A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver?) AS ACCESSES

query.description: What is the stack trace for this lock event?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT s.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", s.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", s.INFILE "File", s.LOCATION "Location", s.ATLINE "Line__(r)" FROM TABLE (STACKTRACE(?LETRACE?)) s

query.description: Where is this field accessed by the program?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT DISTINCT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__(r)|" FROM ACCESS A, TRACE TR, SITE S, OBJECT CO WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER IS NULL AND TR.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = TR.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS ORDER BY 1,2,3

query.description: What are the lock events for this lock graph edge?

ad-hoc.query: select lo.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", lo.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", s.AtLine "Line__]", tho.ThreadName "Thread__|", lh.LockEvent "LockEvent__(r)",tr.id "LETRACE__(hide)" from LOCKSHELD as lh, LOCK l, TRACE tr, SITE s, OBJECT lo, OBJECT tho where lh.LockHeld=?LockHeld? and lh.LockAcquired=?LockAcquired? and lh.LockEvent=l.Id and tr.Id = l.Trace and s.Id = tr.Site and lo.Id = s.InClass and tho.Id = l.InThread order by lo.PackageName,lo.ClassName, s.AtLine, tho.ThreadName, lh.LockEvent

query.description: What instances of this non-static field have an empty lock set?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT OBJID(FIT.RECEIVER) "?Field? Object", SUM(FIT.READCOUNT) + SUM(FIT.READUCCOUNT) "Reads", SUM(FIT.WRITECOUNT) + SUM(FIT.WRITEUCCOUNT) "Writes", SUM(FIT.READUCCOUNT) "Reads Under Construction", SUM(FIT.WRITEUCCOUNT) "Writes Under Construction", ?FieldId? "FieldId__(hide)", FIT.RECEIVER "Receiver__(hide)" FROM FIELDINSTANCETHREAD FIT INNER JOIN INTERESTINGFIELD IF ON IF.FIELD = FIT.FIELD AND IF.RECEIVER = FIT.RECEIVER LEFT OUTER JOIN FIELDINSTANCELOCKSET FIL ON FIL.FIELD = FIT.FIELD AND FIL.RECEIVER = FIT.RECEIVER WHERE FIT.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND FIL.LOCK IS NULL GROUP BY FIT.RECEIVER ORDER BY 1

query.description: What threads read and write this field?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT CO.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", CO.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", F.FieldName "Field", THO.ThreadName "Thread__|", FI.ReadCount + FI.ReadUCCount "Reads", FI.WriteCount + FI.WriteUCCount "Writes", FI.ReadUCCount "Reads During Construction__(sum on 2,3)", FI.WriteUCCount "Writes During Construction__(sum on 2,3)" FROM FIELDINSTANCETHREAD FI, OBJECT THO, FIELD F, OBJECT CO WHERE FI.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND FI.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND THO.ID = FI.THREAD AND F.ID = FI.FIELD AND CO.ID = F.DECLARINGTYPE

query.description: What objects are protected by this lock, and how often?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No accesses occur while this lock is held SELECT DT.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", DT.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", OBJID(A.RECEIVER) "Object__|", IA.HELD "Times Held__(r)", COUNT(A.ID) "Total Accesses__(r)", CAST ((CAST (IA.HELD AS FLOAT) / CAST (COUNT(A.ID) AS FLOAT) * 100) AS DECIMAL) "%__(r)" FROM (SELECT A.RECEIVER, COUNT(DISTINCT A.ID) "HELD" FROM (SELECT ALH.ACCESS FROM LOCK L, INDIRECTACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH WHERE L.LOCK = ?Lock? AND ALH.LASTACQUISITION = L.ID UNION SELECT ALH.ACCESS FROM LOCKSHELD LH, INDIRECTACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH WHERE LH.LOCKHELD = ?Lock? AND ALH.LASTACQUISITION = LH.LOCKEVENT) AS AIDS, INDIRECTACCESS A WHERE A.ID = AIDS.ACCESS GROUP BY A.RECEIVER) AS IA, INDIRECTACCESS A, OBJECT O, OBJECT DT WHERE A.RECEIVER = IA.RECEIVER AND O.ID = A.RECEIVER AND DT.ID = O.TYPE GROUP BY DT.PACKAGENAME,DT.CLASSNAME,A.RECEIVER,IA.HELD ORDER BY 1,2,3

query.description: When and where did this lock event occur?

ad-hoc.query: select l.TS "Time", t.ThreadName "Thread", l.Lock "Lock", lkType.ClassName "Lock Class__('class.gif')", l.LockIsThis "Lock on this", l.LockIsClass "Lock on class", l.State "State", cl.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", cl.ClassName "Class_('class.gif')", s.AtLine "Line" from LOCK as l, TRACE tr, SITE s, OBJECT as cl, OBJECT as lk, OBJECT as t, OBJECT as lkType where l.Id = ?LockEvent? and tr.Id = l.Trace and s.Id = tr.Site and s.InClass = cl.Id and l.Lock = lk.Id and l.InThread = t.Id and lk.Type = lkType.Id

query.description: How often is a lock held when this field is accessed?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No locks are ever held when this field is accessed. SELECT LOCKS.*, ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT "?Field? Access Count__(r)", CAST (((CAST (LOCKS."Times Acquired__(r)" AS FLOAT)) / (CAST (ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT AS FLOAT))) * 100 AS DECIMAL) "Percentage Held__(r)" FROM (SELECT OBJID(LOCK) "Lock__(r)", LOCK "Lock__(hide)", COUNT(LOCK) "Times Acquired__(r)" FROM (SELECT L.LOCK FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? UNION ALL SELECT LH.LOCKHELD "LOCK" FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD LH WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND LH.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? ) AS FOO GROUP BY LOCK) AS LOCKS, (SELECT COUNT(*) "ACCESSCOUNT" FROM ACCESS A WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId?) AS ACCESSES

query.description: What are the individual instances of this non-static field?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT OBJID(COUNTS.RECEIVER) "?Field? Object", COUNTS.READS + COUNTS.READSUC "Reads", COUNTS.WRITES + COUNTS.WRITESUC "Writes", COUNTS.READSUC "Reads Under Construction", COUNTS.WRITESUC "Writes Under Construction", CASE WHEN LOCKS.COUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LOCKS.COUNT END "Lock Set Size", ?FieldId? "FieldId__(hide)", COUNTS.RECEIVER "Receiver__(hide)" FROM (SELECT RECEIVER, SUM(READCOUNT) "READS", SUM(WRITECOUNT) "WRITES", SUM(READUCCOUNT) "READSUC", SUM(WRITEUCCOUNT) "WRITESUC" FROM FIELDINSTANCETHREAD WHERE FIELD = ?FieldId? GROUP BY RECEIVER) AS COUNTS LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT RECEIVER, COUNT(LOCK) "COUNT" FROM FIELDINSTANCELOCKSET WHERE FIELD = ?FieldId? GROUP BY RECEIVER) AS LOCKS ON COUNTS.RECEIVER = LOCKS.RECEIVER

query.description: What are the improperly published instances of this non-static field?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No instances of this field are accessed by multiple threads during object construction. SELECT OBJID(COUNTS.RECEIVER) "?Field? Object", COUNTS.READS + COUNTS.READSUC "Reads", COUNTS.WRITES + COUNTS.WRITESUC "Writes", COUNTS.READSUC "Reads Under Construction", COUNTS.WRITESUC "Writes Under Construction", CASE WHEN LOCKS.COUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LOCKS.COUNT END "Lock Set Size", ?FieldId? "FieldId__(hide)", COUNTS.RECEIVER "Receiver__(hide)" FROM BADPUBLISH BP INNER JOIN (SELECT RECEIVER, SUM(READCOUNT) "READS", SUM(WRITECOUNT) "WRITES", SUM(READUCCOUNT) "READSUC", SUM(WRITEUCCOUNT) "WRITESUC" FROM FIELDINSTANCETHREAD WHERE FIELD = ?FieldId? GROUP BY RECEIVER) AS COUNTS ON COUNTS.RECEIVER = BP.RECEIVER AND BP.FIELD = ?FieldId? LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT RECEIVER, COUNT(LOCK) "COUNT" FROM FIELDINSTANCELOCKSET WHERE FIELD = ?FieldId? GROUP BY RECEIVER) AS LOCKS ON COUNTS.RECEIVER = LOCKS.RECEIVER

query.description: What fields (non-static, non-final) are shared?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No non-static fields are shared between two or more threads. select O.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", O.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", F.FieldName "Field__|", SUM(FI.ReadUCCount) + SUM(FI.ReadCount) "Reads__(sum on 2)(r)", SUM(FI.WriteUCCount) + SUM(FI.WriteCount) "Writes__(sum on 2)(r)", SUM(FI.ReadUCCount) "Reads During Construction__(sum on 2)(r)", SUM(FI.WriteUCCount) "Writes During Construction__(sum on 2)(r)", MAX(FIRC.RC) "Instances__(r)", COUNT(DISTINCT THO.ThreadName) "Threads Involved__(r)", F.Id "FieldId__(hide)" from OBJECT O, FIELD F, FIELDINSTANCETHREAD FI, OBJECT THO, (SELECT FIELD, COUNT(DISTINCT RECEIVER) "RC" FROM FIELDINSTANCETHREAD GROUP BY FIELD) AS FIRC where F.DeclaringType = O.Id and F.Final = 'N' and FI.FIELD = F.ID and THO.ID = FI.Thread and FIRC.FIELD = F.ID group by O.PackageName,O.ClassName,F.FieldName,F.Id order by O.PackageName,O.ClassName,F.FieldName

query.description: Where are fields accessed while this lock is held?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No accesses occur while this lock is held SELECT DISTINCT PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", ATLINE "Line__(r)|" FROM (SELECT CO.PACKAGENAME, CO.CLASSNAME, S.ATLINE FROM LOCKSHELD LH, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, ACCESS A, TRACE T, SITE S, OBJECT CO WHERE LH.LOCKHELD = ?Lock? AND ALH.LASTACQUISITION = LH.LOCKEVENT AND A.ID = ALH.ACCESS AND T.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = T.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS UNION SELECT CO.PACKAGENAME, CO.CLASSNAME, S.ATLINE FROM LOCK L, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, ACCESS A, TRACE T, SITE S, OBJECT CO WHERE L.LOCK = ?Lock? AND ALH.LASTACQUISITION = L.ID AND A.ID = ALH.ACCESS AND T.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = T.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS) AS ACCESSES ORDER BY 1,2,3

query.description: When and by what threads was this field accessed?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT '?Package?' "Package__('package.gif')", '?Class?' "Class__('class.gif')", '?Field?' "Field", THO.THREADNAME "Thread__|", A.TS "Time", CASE WHEN A.RW = 'R' THEN 'Read' ELSE 'Write' END "Access", CASE WHEN A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N' THEN ' ' ELSE 'Yes' END "Under Construction__(c)", CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__(hide)", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__(hide)", S.ATLINE "Line__(hide)", A.ID "AID__(hide)", A.TRACE "ATRACE__(hide)" FROM ACCESS A, OBJECT THO, TRACE T, SITE S, OBJECT CO WHERE T.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = T.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS AND THO.Id = A.InThread AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? ORDER BY A.TS ASC

query.description: What locks could potentially cause deadlock?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No potential lock cycles were observed during this run of the program. select Component "Cycle", OBJID(LockHeld) "LockHeld__(r)|", OBJID(LockAcquired) "LockAcquired__(r)", Count "Count__(r)", FirstTime "FirstTime", LastTime "LastTime", LockHeld "LockHeld__(hide)", LockAcquired "LockAcquired__(hide)" from lockcycle where count > 0 order by count desc

query.description: What is the stack trace for this access?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT s.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", s.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", s.INFILE "File", s.LOCATION "Location", s.ATLINE "Line__(r)" FROM TABLE (STACKTRACE(?ATRACE?)) s

query.description: When do we acquire a lock here?

ad-hoc.query: --TODO Instead of showing every event, we may just want to show all of the relevant traces SELECT '?Package?' "Package__('package.gif')", '?Class?' "Class__('class.gif')", ?Line? "Line__(r)", L.TS "Time__|", COUNT (LOCKHELD) "Locks Already Held__(r)", THO.THREADNAME "ThreadName", LH.LOCKEVENT "LockEvent__(hide)", TR.ID "LETRACE__(hide)" FROM OBJECT O, SITE S, TRACE TR, LOCK L, LOCKSHELD LH, OBJECT THO WHERE O.CLASSNAME = '?Class?' AND O.PACKAGENAME = '?Package?' AND S.INCLASS = O.ID AND S.ATLINE = ?Line? AND TR.SITE = S.ID AND L.TRACE = TR.ID AND LH.LOCKEVENT = L.ID AND THO.ID = LH.INTHREAD GROUP BY LH.LOCKEVENT,L.TS,THO.THREADNAME,TR.ID ORDER BY 5 DESC,4

query.description: Where does a thread hold a lock and acquire another?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No locks were observed to be acquired while another was already held during this run of the program. SELECT PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", ATLINE "Line__|(r)", MAX (HELDCOUNT) "Most Locks Already Held__(r)(max on 2)" FROM ( SELECT COUNT (LH.LOCKHELD) "HELDCOUNT", LO.CLASSNAME, LO.PACKAGENAME, S.ATLINE FROM LOCKSHELD LH, LOCK LE, TRACE TR, SITE S, OBJECT LO WHERE LH.LOCKEVENT = LE.ID AND TR.ID = LE.TRACE AND S.ID = TR.SITE AND LO.ID = S.INCLASS GROUP BY LH.LOCKEVENT,LO.CLASSNAME,LO.PACKAGENAME,S.ATLINE,LE.TRACE) AS T GROUP BY CLASSNAME,PACKAGENAME,ATLINE

query.description: How often is a lock held when this field is accessed?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No locks are ever held when this field is accessed. SELECT LOCKS.*, ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT "?Field? Access Count__(r)", CAST (((CAST (LOCKS."Times Acquired__(r)" AS FLOAT)) / (CAST (ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT AS FLOAT))) * 100 AS DECIMAL) "Percentage Held__(r)" FROM (SELECT OBJID(LOCK) "Lock__(r)", LOCK "Lock__(hide)", COUNT(LOCK) "Times Acquired__(r)" FROM (SELECT L.LOCK FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? UNION ALL SELECT LH.LOCKHELD "LOCK" FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD LH WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND LH.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver?) AS FOO GROUP BY LOCK) AS LOCKS, (SELECT COUNT(*) "ACCESSCOUNT" FROM ACCESS A WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver?) AS ACCESSES

query.description: What instances of this class are indirectly accessed by more than one thread?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT OBJID(IA.RECEIVER) "Object", THO.THREADNAME "Thread__|", COUNT (IA.ID) "Accesses__(r)", IA.RECEIVER "Receiver__(hide)" FROM (SELECT IA.RECEIVER FROM OBJECT C, OBJECT R, INDIRECTACCESS IA WHERE C.PACKAGENAME = '?Package?' AND C.CLASSNAME = '?Class?' AND R.TYPE = C.ID AND IA.RECEIVER = R.ID GROUP BY IA.RECEIVER HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT IA.INTHREAD) > 1) AS R, INDIRECTACCESS IA, OBJECT THO WHERE IA.RECEIVER = R.RECEIVER AND THO.ID = IA.INTHREAD GROUP BY IA.RECEIVER, THO.THREADNAME ORDER BY 1, 3 DESC

query.description: What locks are held during this field access?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No locks are held during this access of the field. --TODO make this look like a lock trace SELECT O.THREADNAME "Thread", A.TS "Time", OBJID(D.Lock) "Lock__|", LO.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", LO.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", S.AtLine "Line__(r)", D.ID "LDID__(hide)", A.TRACE "ATRACE__(hide)",L.TRACE "LATRACE__(hide)" FROM ACCESS A INNER JOIN OBJECT O ON O.Id = A.InThread INNER JOIN LOCKDURATION D ON D.InThread = A.InThread AND (A.TS BETWEEN D.Start AND D.Stop) LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCK L ON L.Id = D.StartEvent LEFT OUTER JOIN TRACE TR ON TR.Id = L.TRACE LEFT OUTER JOIN SITE S ON S.Id = TR.SITE LEFT OUTER JOIN OBJECT LO ON LO.Id = S.InClass WHERE A.ID = ?AID? ORDER BY O.THREADNAME ASC, A.TS ASC, D.Start DESC

query.description: Where is this field accessed while this lock is held?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__(r)|" FROM ACCESS A, TRACE TR, SITE S, OBJECT CO, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND TR.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = TR.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS AND ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND L.LOCK = ?Lock? UNION DISTINCT SELECT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__(r)|" FROM ACCESS A, TRACE TR, SITE S, OBJECT CO, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD L WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND TR.ID = A.TRACE AND S.ID = TR.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS AND ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND L.LOCKHELD = ?Lock? ORDER BY 1,2,3

query.description: Where is this field accessed while this lock is not held?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT DISTINCT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__(r)|" FROM ACCESS A INNER JOIN TRACE TR ON TR.ID = A.TRACE INNER JOIN SITE S ON S.ID = TR.SITE INNER JOIN OBJECT CO ON CO.ID = S.INCLASS LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH ON ALH.ACCESS = A.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCK L ON L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND (L.LOCK IS NULL OR (L.LOCK != ?Lock? AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT LOCKHELD FROM LOCKSHELD WHERE LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION) OR ?Lock? != ANY (SELECT LOCKHELD FROM LOCKSHELD WHERE LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION))))

query.description: What fields (non-static) are shared?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No non-static fields are shared between two or more threads. select O.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", O.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", F.FieldName "Field__|", SUM(FI.ReadUCCount) + SUM(FI.ReadCount) "Reads__(sum on 2)(r)", SUM(FI.WriteUCCount) + SUM(FI.WriteCount) "Writes__(sum on 2)(r)", SUM(FI.ReadUCCount) "Reads During Construction__(sum on 2)(r)", SUM(FI.WriteUCCount) "Writes During Construction__(sum on 2)(r)", MAX(FIRC.RC) "Instances__(r)", COUNT(DISTINCT THO.ThreadName) "Threads Involved__(r)", F.Id "FieldId__(hide)" from OBJECT O, FIELD F, FIELDINSTANCETHREAD FI, OBJECT THO, (SELECT FIELD, COUNT(DISTINCT RECEIVER) "RC" FROM FIELDINSTANCETHREAD GROUP BY FIELD) AS FIRC where F.DeclaringType = O.Id and FI.FIELD = F.ID and THO.ID = FI.Thread and FIRC.FIELD = F.ID group by O.PackageName,O.ClassName,F.FieldName,F.Id order by O.PackageName,O.ClassName,F.FieldName

query.description: What fields (static) have an empty lock set?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=All non-final non-volatile static fields that are shared have a common lock held for each access. SELECT O.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", O.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", FI.FieldName "Field__|", I.FIELD "FieldId__(hide)" FROM OBJECT O INNER JOIN FIELD FI ON FI.DeclaringType = O.Id INNER JOIN INTERESTINGFIELD I ON I.RECEIVER IS NULL AND I.FIELD=FI.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FIELDLOCKSET F ON F.FIELD = I.FIELD WHERE F.LOCK IS NULL ORDER BY O.PackageName,O.ClassName,FI.FieldName

query.description: Which threads and what code contend for this lock?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No threads were forced to wait for this lock. -- This query shows the locations and threads of all places this lock -- was contended for. Some entries appear to be duplicates, but actually -- represent different stack traces. select lo.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", lo.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", s.AtLine "Line__]", tho.ThreadName "Thread__|", (trim(cast(sum(ld.Duration) as char(20))) || ' ns') "BlockTime__(sum ' ns')(r)", count(ld.lock) as "Times Acquired__(sum)(r)", (trim (cast(sum(ld.Duration) as char(20)))) || ' ns' as "Total Block Time__(sum ' ns')(r)", (trim (cast((sum(ld.Duration) / count (ld.lock)) as char(20)))) || ' ns' as "Average Block Time__(r)", le.trace "LATRACE__(hide)" from LOCKDURATION ld, LOCK le, TRACE tr, SITE s, OBJECT lo, OBJECT tho where ld.Lock=?Lock? and ld.State = 'BLOCKING' and le.Id=ld.StartEvent and tr.Id = le.Trace and s.Id = tr.Site and lo.Id = s.InClass and tho.Id = ld.InThread group by lo.PackageName,lo.ClassName, s.AtLine, tho.ThreadName, le.trace order by lo.PackageName, lo.ClassName, s.AtLine, tho.ThreadName, sum(ld.Duration) desc

query.description: What locks are contended for the longest time?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No locks were observed to be acquired during this run of the program. select OBJID(Lock) "Lock__(c)", Lock "Lock__(hide)", count(lock) as "Times Acquired__(r)", (trim (cast(sum(Duration) as char(20)))) || ' ns' as "Total Block Time__(r)", (trim (cast((sum(duration) / count (lock)) as char(20)))) || ' ns' as "Average Block Time__(r)" from LOCKDURATION where State = 'BLOCKING' group by Lock order by sum(duration) / count (lock) desc

query.description: What threads read and write this field?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT CO.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", CO.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", F.FieldName "Field", THO.ThreadName "Thread__|", FI.ReadCount "Reads__(sum on 2,3)", FI.WriteCount "Writes__(sum on 2,3)" FROM FIELDSTATICTHREAD FI, OBJECT THO, FIELD F, OBJECT CO WHERE FI.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND THO.ID = FI.THREAD AND F.ID = FI.FIELD AND CO.ID = F.DECLARINGTYPE

query.description: What kinds of objects are indirectly accessed by more than one thread?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT T.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", T.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')|", COUNT(DISTINCT THO.THREADNAME) "Threads__(r)", COUNT (IA.ID) "Accesses__(sum on 3)(r)" FROM (SELECT RECEIVER FROM INDIRECTACCESS GROUP BY RECEIVER HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT INTHREAD) > 1) AS R, INDIRECTACCESS IA, OBJECT O, OBJECT T, OBJECT THO WHERE IA.RECEIVER = R.RECEIVER AND O.ID = IA.RECEIVER AND T.ID = O.TYPE AND THO.ID = IA.INTHREAD GROUP BY T.PACKAGENAME, T.CLASSNAME ORDER BY 1,2,3,4

query.description: What fields (non-static) have an empty lock set?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=All non-final non-volatile non-static fields that are shared after object construction have a common lock held for each access. SELECT O.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", O.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", FI.FieldName "Field__|", COUNT(DISTINCT I.Receiver) "Instances", I.Field "FieldId__(hide)" FROM OBJECT O INNER JOIN FIELD FI ON FI.DeclaringType = O.Id INNER JOIN INTERESTINGFIELD I ON FI.STATIC = 'N' AND I.FIELD=FI.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FIELDINSTANCELOCKSET F ON F.FIELD = I.FIELD AND F.RECEIVER = I.RECEIVER WHERE F.LOCK IS NULL GROUP BY O.PackageName, O.ClassName, FI.FieldName, I.Field ORDER BY O.PackageName, O.ClassName, FI.FieldName

query.description: Where is this field accessed while this lock is not held?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT DISTINCT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__(r)|" FROM ACCESS A INNER JOIN TRACE TR ON TR.ID = A.TRACE INNER JOIN SITE S ON S.ID = TR.SITE INNER JOIN OBJECT CO ON CO.ID = S.INCLASS LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH ON ALH.ACCESS = A.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCK L ON L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND (L.LOCK IS NULL OR (L.LOCK != ?Lock? AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT LOCKHELD FROM LOCKSHELD WHERE LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION) OR ?Lock? != ANY (SELECT LOCKHELD FROM LOCKSHELD WHERE LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION))))

query.description: Show Tables

ad-hoc.query: select st.TABLENAME "Table", sco.columnname "Column__|", sco.columndatatype "Column Data Type", sco.autoincrementvalue "Autoincrement Value", sco.autoincrementstart "Autoincurement Start", sco.autoincrementinc "Autoincrement Increment" from sys.sysschemas sc,sys.systables st,sys.syscolumns sco where sc.schemaname = 'FLASHLIGHT' and st.schemaid = sc.schemaid and sco.referenceid = st.tableid order by st.tablename,sco.columnnumber

query.description: Where are fields accessed during this particular lock acquisition?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No accesses occur while this lock is held SELECT DISTINCT CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class__]('class.gif')", S.ATLINE "Line__|(r)" FROM LOCKDURATION D, ACCESS A, TRACE T, SITE S, OBJECT CO WHERE D.STARTEVENT = ?LockEvent? AND A.INTHREAD = D.INTHREAD AND A.TS BETWEEN D.START AND D.STOP AND S.ID = T.SITE AND CO.ID = S.INCLASS ORDER BY 1,2,3

query.description: What is the lock trace for this lock event?

ad-hoc.query: SELECT OBJID(D.Lock) "Lock__(r)", D.Lock "Lock__(hide)", LO.PackageName "Package__('package.gif')", LO.ClassName "Class__('class.gif')", S.AtLine "Line__(r)", D.Start "Time", D.ID "LDID__(hide)", LL.TRACE "LATRACE__(hide)" FROM LOCK L, LOCKDURATION D, LOCK LL, TRACE T, SITE S, OBJECT LO WHERE D.InThread = L.InThread AND (L.TS BETWEEN D.START AND D.STOP) AND D.STATE = 'HOLDING' AND LL.Id = D.StartEvent AND T.Id = LL.Trace AND S.Id = T.Site AND LO.Id = S.InClass AND L.Id = ?LockEvent? ORDER BY D.START DESC

query.description: What fields are protected by this lock, and how often?

ad-hoc.query: -- NO-ROWS-MSG=No accesses occur while this lock is held SELECT DT.PACKAGENAME "Package__('package.gif')", DT.CLASSNAME "Class__('class.gif')", F.FIELDNAME "Field__|", F.ID "FieldId__(hide)", FA.HELD "Times Held__(r)", COUNT(A.ID) "Total Accesses__(r)", CAST ((CAST (FA.HELD AS FLOAT) / CAST (COUNT(A.ID) AS FLOAT) * 100) AS DECIMAL) "%__(r)" FROM (SELECT A.FIELD, COUNT(DISTINCT A.ID) "HELD" FROM (SELECT ALH.ACCESS FROM LOCK L, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH WHERE L.LOCK = ?Lock? AND ALH.LASTACQUISITION = L.ID UNION SELECT ALH.ACCESS FROM LOCKSHELD LH, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH WHERE LH.LOCKHELD = ?Lock? AND ALH.LASTACQUISITION = LH.LOCKEVENT) AS AIDS, ACCESS A, FIELD F WHERE A.ID = AIDS.ACCESS AND F.ID = A.FIELD GROUP BY A.FIELD) AS FA, FIELD F, ACCESS A, OBJECT DT WHERE F.ID = FA.FIELD AND A.FIELD = F.ID AND DT.ID = F.DECLARINGTYPE GROUP BY DT.PACKAGENAME,DT.CLASSNAME,F.FIELDNAME,F.ID,FA.HELD ORDER BY 1,2,3
